genz_professional_leadership.name: Main Character Energy
genz_professional_leadership.short: Has that CEO mindset, sees the vision before it's obvious
genz_professional_leadership.long: This person has main character energy when it comes to strategy. They're not just reacting to the game - they're three moves ahead, calling plays nobody else saw coming. Pure visionary vibes.
genz_professional_leadership.cultural_notes: GenZ values authentic leadership that doesn't feel corporate

genz_professional_leadership.name: Hype Person
genz_professional_leadership.short: Makes everyone level up, brings the energy
genz_professional_leadership.long: The ultimate hype person who makes the whole squad better. They create that safe space where everyone can be themselves and pop off. When they're around, the whole vibe just hits different.

genz_professional_leadership.name: No Cap Decision Maker
genz_professional_leadership.short: Makes the call when it matters, no hesitation
genz_professional_leadership.long: When everyone's spiraling, this person just makes the call - no cap, no overthinking. They trust their gut, commit to the move, and own the outcome. Built different when pressure hits.

genz_professional_leadership.name: Vibe Architect
genz_professional_leadership.short: Creates the energy everyone wants to be around
genz_professional_leadership.long: This person architects the vibes. Not in a forced HR way - they genuinely create spaces where people feel safe to be themselves and the culture just naturally slaps.

genz_professional_leadership.name: Plot Twist Navigator
genz_professional_leadership.short: Leads through change without the chaos
genz_professional_leadership.long: When everything's changing and people are stressed, this person guides everyone through the plot twist. They keep it real about what's hard but help you see why the change hits.

genz_professional_leadership.name: Glow Up Enabler
genz_professional_leadership.short: Helps people reach their final form
genz_professional_leadership.long: This person sees your potential before you do and actively helps you glow up. They're invested in your growth journey and celebrate every level-up moment with genuine hype.

genz_professional_leadership.name: For The Team
genz_professional_leadership.short: Leads by clearing the path, not blocking it
genz_professional_leadership.long: Pure 'for the team' energy. They're not ego-tripping on being the boss - they're literally just clearing obstacles so everyone else can shine. That's real leadership.

genz_professional_leadership.name: Mediator
genz_professional_leadership.short: Gets everyone aligned without the drama
genz_professional_leadership.long: When the group chat is divided, this person somehow gets everyone to agree without forcing it. They make everyone feel heard and find that middle ground that actually works.

genz_social_character.name: Day One Energy
genz_social_character.short: Always there when it counts, no flaking
genz_social_character.long: Has that day one energy - when you need them, they're there. No flaking, no excuses. They understand that showing up is literally the foundation of everything.

genz_social_character.name: Keeps It Real
genz_social_character.short: Says what needs to be said, no sugar coating
genz_social_character.long: This person keeps it 100 even when the truth is uncomfortable. They're not being mean - they're being real because they actually care enough to be honest.

genz_social_character.name: Unapologetically Them
genz_social_character.short: Never tries to be someone they're not
genz_social_character.long: Unapologetically themselves 24/7. They're not code-switching, not performing for approval - just existing in their truth. That energy gives everyone else permission to do the same.

genz_social_character.name: Reads The Room
genz_social_character.short: Just gets it without anyone explaining
genz_social_character.long: Has incredible emotional intelligence - reads the room instantly, picks up on subtle energy shifts, and responds with exactly what's needed. Just gets people on a deeper level.

genz_social_connection.name: Link Up Specialist
genz_social_connection.short: Connects people who need to meet each other
genz_social_connection.long: Always linking people up who vibe. They see connections others miss and create intro's that actually matter. Your network grows just from knowing them.

genz_social_connection.name: Safe Space
genz_social_connection.short: Makes it safe to be vulnerable and real
genz_social_connection.long: Creates that rare safe space where you can actually be vulnerable without judgment. They hold your secrets like Fort Knox and respond to real talk with genuine support.

genz_civic_service.name: Movement Starter
genz_civic_service.short: Gets people mobilized for the cause
genz_civic_service.long: Starts movements that actually matter. Not performative activism - real organizing that gets the community mobilized and creates actual change. Built different.

_metadata.language_style: Authentic GenZ vernacular without forced slang
_metadata.usage: Alternative display names/descriptions for same recognition behaviors
_metadata.notes: Maintains same trust values and rarity - only language changes
